bioAsHtml: Co-founder of Triplequote, a company aiming at boosting Scala teams' productivity. Mirco has 10+ year experience with Scala, and he has contributed to several open source projects such as Lagom, Playframework, Scala IDE for Eclipse, and the Scala language. Before founding his own company, he worked at Lightbend (formerly Typesafe), where he wore different hats: from engineering, to consulting, and, fun fact, even sales! He is a certified Lightbend trainer for Akka, Playframework, and Scala. He loves meeting people and sharing experiences. In his freetime, he plays chess and studies wine - both theory and practice! :)
